alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 6:53PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Lucie, northern Okeechobee, southern Indian River and southeastern Osceola Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pointe West, or near Vero Beach South, moving east at 40 mph. An additional strong storm near Kissimmee Prairie Preserve will also moving quickly east. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce, Vero Beach, Indian River Shores, Vero Beach South, Gifford and Fort Drum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee; Osceola
